data.title: Tuesday Weld
data.text:
AKA Susan Ker Weld

Born: 27-Aug-1943

Birthplace: New York City

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Looking for Mr. Goodbar

Father: Lathrop Motley Weld (d. when Tuesday was 3)

Mother: Aileen Weld

Husband: Claude Harz (m. Oct-1965, div. 1970)

Husband: Dudley Moore (actor, m. 20-Sep-1975, div. 1980, one son)

Son: (b. 1976)

Husband: Pinchas Zukerman (m. 18-Oct-1985, div. 1998)

Slept with: Peter Cook (1973)

High School: Hollywood High School, Hollywood, CA

Golden Globe 1960 for Most Promising Newcomer, Female

Nervous Breakdown 1952

Abortion 1975

Suicide Attempt

Risk Factors: Alcoholism, Smoking

TELEVISION

The Many Loves of Dobie Gillis Thalia Menninger (1959-60)
